name: Board
public_notice: Board BRD has recently migrated from their old contract to a new one. Visit this post for more information. You may visit the old token page here.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.
